# Amalgamations
---
#noun
- **The [[p/_process|process]] of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a [[m/_mixture|mixture]], [[m/_merger|merger]] or [[c/_consolidation|consolidation]].**
- **The [[r/_result|result]] of [[a/_amalgamating|amalgamating]]; a [[m/_mixture|mixture]] or [[a/_alloy|alloy]].**
- **The [[i/_intermarriage|intermarriage]] and [[i/_interbreeding|interbreeding]] of [[d/_different|different]] ethnicities or [[r/_races|races]].**
